data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Diego Martin, Trinidad and Tobago.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Diego Martin, Trinidad and Tobago
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 24,293 believers in Diego Martin to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Diego Martin prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 24,293 believers living in the state of Diego Martin. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Petit Valley
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Petit Valley, Diego Martin, Trinidad and Tobago.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Diego Martin to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Diego Martin a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary:
the state of Diego Martin, Trinidad and Tobago has a population of 103,000.

We estimate Diego Martin has 24,293 people who might know Jesus, 44,552 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 34,156 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Diego Martin, Trinidad and Tobago.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
